mapper.select: SELECT id,open_id as openId,device_id as deviceId,(select sum(scores) from device where open_id = #{openId}) as scores ,total_scores as totalScores,game_id as gameId,nick_name as nickName,img_url as imgUrl FROM device where open_id = #{openId} and game_id = #{gameId} order by id desc limit 1

SELECT t.id,open_id as openId,t.device_id as deviceId,(select sum(scores) from device where open_id = t.open_id) as scores,t.total_scores as totalScores,t.game_id as gameId,t.nick_name as nickName,t.img_url as imgUrl FROM device t where t.game_id = #{gameId} order by t.total_scores DESC
